meanings.definition: A photograph taken at close range, typically capturing small details.
meanings.sent1: I took a macrophotograph of a tiny flower petal.
meanings.sent2: The macrophotograph of the insect's wing showed intricate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The macrophotograph of the ant made it look like a giant monster!
meanings.sent4: Her macrophotograph of the snowflake revealed its unique beauty.
meanings.sent5: The macrophotograph of the leaf displayed its delicate veins clearly.
